roadmap.description: Ensure Node.js is installed on your system.
Create a new directory for your project.
Navigate into the new directory using your terminal or command prompt.
Create a new file named `index.js` (or any other name ending in `.js`) inside the directory.
Open the `index.js` file in a text editor.
Add the following line of code to the file: `console.log('Hello, World!');`
Open your terminal or command prompt and navigate to the project directory if you are not already there.
Run the Node.js script by typing `node index.js` and pressing Enter.
Verify that "Hello, World!" is printed to your console.
